item.title: How to customize the PersonalBlog starter's appearance
item.description: The starter uses a theme object so base customization is really easy. Find the file. … Front-end web development To read the whole…
item.content:encoded:
The starter uses a theme object so base customization is really easy.

Find the theme.js file.

root
  ├── src
  │   ├── styles
  │   │   ├── colors.js
  │   │   ├── globals.js
  │   │   └── theme.js

…

Front-end web development

To read the whole instruction article - How to customize the personalBlog starter’s appearance - you have to move to Front-end web development with Greg website.

…

item.title: Setup Algolia account for your GatsbyJS blog
item.description: As I wrote in the Starter Instalation post the starter needs access data to your Algolia account. If you do not have an Algolia account…
item.content:encoded:
As I wrote in the Starter Instalation post the starter needs access data to your Algolia account.

If you do not have an Algolia account yet you have to sign up now.

If you already have an account go and open the Apps page and click the NEW APPLICATION button.

…

Front-end web development

To read the whole instruction article - Setup Algolia account for your GatsbyJS blog - you have to move to Front-end web development with Greg website.

…

item.title: How to install, setup and add new content to the personalBlog starter
item.description: You install the starter like any other GatsbyJS starter . … Front-end web development To read the whole instruction article - How to…
item.content:encoded:
You install the starter like any other GatsbyJS starter.

gatsby new [NEW_SITE_DIRECTORY_FOR_YOUR_BLOG] https://github.com/greglobinski/gatsby-starter-personal-blog.git

…

Front-end web development

To read the whole instruction article - How to install, setup and add new content to the personalBlog starter - you have to move to Front-end web development with Greg website.

…
